title: Introduction to Plant Biotechnology and Tissue Culture

questions.question: What is plant biotechnology?
choices: The use of biological systems to modify plants or agricultural processes
The cultivation of plants in greenhouses
The genetic modification of animals for agricultural use
questions.answer: The use of biological systems to modify plants or agricultural processes

questions.question: Which principle is plant tissue culture based on?
What is micropropagation?
choices: The study of microscopic plant structures
The rapid multiplication of plants using tissue culture techniques
The use of microorganisms to improve soil quality
The propagation of plants using microscopic seeds
questions.answer: The rapid multiplication of plants using tissue culture techniques

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of plant tissue culture?
What is an explant in tissue culture?
choices: A piece of tissue taken from a plant for culture initiation
questions.answer: A piece of tissue taken from a plant for culture initiation

questions.question: What does 'in vitro' mean in the context of tissue culture?
choices: In a glass or laboratory vessel
questions.answer: In a glass or laboratory vessel

questions.question: Which of the following is an advantage of tissue culture over traditional propagation methods?
What is the primary purpose of meristem culture?
Which of the following is a potential application of tissue culture in Timor Leste?
choices: Rapid multiplication of disease-free planting material
questions.answer: Rapid multiplication of disease-free planting material

questions.question: What is somatic embryogenesis?
choices: The development of embryos from vegetative cells
The fusion of gametes to form an embryo
The transplantation of embryos between species
questions.answer: The development of embryos from vegetative cells

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common application of plant biotechnology?
What is the main purpose of callus culture?
Which of the following is a potential economic benefit of tissue culture for Timor Leste?
choices: Creation of employment in tissue culture laboratories
questions.answer: Creation of employment in tissue culture laboratories

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of embryo culture?
choices: To overcome seed dormancy or embryo abortion
questions.answer: To overcome seed dormancy or embryo abortion

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical component of plant tissue culture media?
What is the main advantage of protoplast culture?
choices: Potential for genetic manipulation at the cellular level
questions.answer: Potential for genetic manipulation at the cellular level

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge in implementing tissue culture in Timor Leste?
What is the primary purpose of phytoremediation in plant biotechnology?
choices: To clean up contaminated soils using plants
questions.answer: To clean up contaminated soils using plants

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical step in the plant tissue culture process?
What is the main purpose of using plant growth regulators in tissue culture media?
Which of the following is a potential application of tissue culture for conservation in Timor Leste?
What is somaclonal variation?
choices: Genetic variation in plants derived from tissue culture
questions.answer: Genetic variation in plants derived from tissue culture

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical application of cell suspension culture?
What is the main advantage of using tissue culture for crop improvement?
choices: It requires less time than traditional breeding methods
It doesn't require any specialized equipment
It always produces genetically modified organisms
It eliminates the need for field trials
questions.answer: It requires less time than traditional breeding methods

questions.question: Which of the following crops could potentially benefit from tissue culture in Timor Leste?
What is the primary purpose of acclimatization in the tissue culture process?
choices: To adapt plants to ex vitro conditions
questions.answer: To adapt plants to ex vitro conditions

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical benefit of using tissue culture for plant propagation?
What is the main purpose of using antibiotics in tissue culture media?
Which of the following is a potential environmental impact of introducing tissue-cultured plants on a large scale?
choices: Increased genetic diversity in wild populations

questions.question: What is the main advantage of using meristem culture for virus elimination?
